text: Ann K is working on this now.  Thanks.  Mark

blocks.subject: Third Party Trading Platform Policy
raw_header: Subject: Third Party Trading Platform Policy
text: I was reviewing information Leslie had left behind and was curious if you
ever had a chance to review and approve the Third Party Platform Policy that
Leslie had prepared?  If not, I have attached a version of the policy below
The only change I see that needs to be made is the replacement of Leslie's
Please let me know if you should need anything further.
